channel.title: How do you i make a ::dropsoff and ::dropson
channel.description: does anyone know how to make a ::dropon-::dropoff commands? if u know it please help me then[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 01, 2009, 03:09:12 pm[/size][hr]does anyone know it??

item.title: How do you i make a ::dropsoff and ::dropson
item.dc:creator: @cowbell cowbell
item.description:
@cowbell wrote:

i’ll show you,
Editing Place: Client.java
Difficulty: 1/5 Doesn’t require knowlegde to copy and paste…

First off open your client.java and search for

 Drags

After that add a command like Onpickup

} if(command.startsWith("onpickup") && playerRights > 2 || command.startsWith("pickupon") && playerRights > 0){ yell("["+playerName+"] - picking up items enabled (::onpickup, ::offpickup for mods)."); server.pickup = true;

if you want Offpickup add a command like this:

} if(command.startsWith("offpickup") && playerRights > 2 || command.startsWith("pickupoff") && playerRights > 0){ yell("["+playerName+"] - picking up items disabled (::onpickup, ::offpickup for mods)."); server.pickup = false;

it should now look like this:

[code] }
} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Drags”)) {
if (teleblock == true) {
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); // made by Killer Pkz
} else {
teleportToX = 2858;
teleportToY = 9844;
sendMessage(“You Teleport to the Metal Dragon Lair”);
}
if(command.startsWith(“onpickup”) && playerRights > 2 || command.startsWith(“pickupon”) && playerRights > 0){
yell("["+playerName+"] - picking up items enabled (::onpickup, ::offpickup for mods).");
server.pickup = true;
}
if(command.startsWith(“offpickup”) && playerRights > 2 || command.startsWith(“pickupoff”) && playerRights > 0){
yell("["+playerName+"] - picking up items disabled (::onpickup, ::offpickup for mods).");
server.pickup = false;

        }
    } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("wc")) {
        if (teleblock == true) {
            sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Killer Pkz
        } else {
            teleportToX = 2544;
            teleportToY = 3878;
            sendMessage("Grab Axe And Start Cutting Trees.");[/code]

Complie and you shouldn’t get any errors if you do pm me…

Read full topic
